content.question: Which of the following is an equivalent form of the expression <math alttext="sin x cos open parentheses negative 3 x close parentheses plus sin open parentheses negative 3 x close parentheses cos x"><mi>sin</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>x</mi><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced><mi>cos</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>x</mi></mpadded></mpadded></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="cos open parentheses negative 2 x close parentheses"><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="sin open parentheses negative 2 x close parentheses"><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="sin open parentheses negative 2 x close parentheses"><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
